[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Supported_Devices On DD-WRT supported devices table] ==Additional external links== *[http://blog.malwarebytes.org/hackedunpacked/2014/02/uart-root-shell-on-commercial-devices/ On the '''Malwarebytes''' ''Unpacked'' Blog] :indicates there was an earlier version of the OM1P.. '''141''2315'''''<...> is silkscreened on that board, which would seem to indicate it is an [[AMX NXA-WAP250G|Accton SAP2315A]]
